Name: Hong Kong Fuey
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: SHAKE first 8 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade.
Review: You may recall Hong Kong Phooey , the 1970s Hanna-Barbera animated children's TV series featuring the mild-mannered janitor Penry and his superhero alter ego. This party cocktail is a little better than Penry's kung fu but deadly all the same.
Nutrition: One serving of Hong Kong Fuey contains 208 calories
